# Interactive graph

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
  }
</style>
<div id="plot">
<svg id="mosaic">
</svg></div>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
<script>
d3.csv('data/df.csv').then(function(data) {
  for(i = 1; i < data.columns.length; i++) {
    let new_div = d3.select('#plot').data(data.columns).append('div')
    new_div.append('input')
      .attr('type', 'checkbox')
      .attr('id', data.columns[i])
      .attr('onchange', 'loadGraphs(this.value)')
      .attr('name', data.columns[i])
    new_div.append('label')
      .attr('for', data.columns[i])
      .text(data.columns[i])
  }
});
</script>
